abstract: South Dakota Public Utilities Commission approves section of Keystone XL oil pipeline planned on South Dakota lands, despite fact that project is stalled on federal level.
lead_paragraph: State regulators again approved the section of the pipeline that would go through South Dakota, despite the project’s stalled status at the federal level.

headline.main: South Dakota: Keystone XL Pipeline Permit Renewed
headline.print_headline: South Dakota: Keystone Xl Pipeline Permit Renewed

snippet: State regulators again approved the section of the pipeline that would go through South Dakota, despite the project’s stalled status at the federal level.
